customerBenefits.title: Labor-intensive dolly movements
customerBenefits.subtitle: Challenges: It is more and more difficult to hire workers, because they prefer to work in delivery services for the same money.

customerBenefits.title: Forklifts, tuggers managed by man
customerBenefits.subtitle: Challenges: It is more and more difficult to hire forklift drivers because they prefer to work in delivery for the same money.

customerBenefits.title: Follow-the-line robots
customerBenefits.subtitle: Challenges: It is time-consuming and expensive to replace old robots by state-of-the art, but produced by another vendor.

customerBenefits.title: Autonomous mobile robots
customerBenefits.subtitle: Challenges: Limited upgrade options within the same vendor robot line only and too expensive to use another vendor robots.

beneifts.title: Top-Notch Technology
beneifts.subtitle: Once you transform your indoor logistics, we'll keep it up-to-date.

beneifts.title: Up-To-Date Software
beneifts.subtitle: You always get immediate software updates including new features and algorithms in background.

beneifts.title: Seamless Fleet Upgrade
beneifts.subtitle: No need to stop the production to upgrade, extend, or replace the fleet. No hassle needed for the new units to get to work.

beneifts.title: Incompatible Robots Team-Up
beneifts.subtitle: Robots produced by tens of different vendors can collaborate in the same workspace.
